GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves up an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves up an array of all articles default sorted by date created DESC

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up the article matching the given article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of all comments for the specified article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is...

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment, assigns a corresponding article_id, timestamp andc new comment_id
